projects.title: Twitter-like Social Feed
projects.description: Build a scalable social feed system with caching
projects.shortDescription: Scalable social feed with feed generation
projects.fullDescription: Design and build a Twitter-like social feed system that handles millions of users, implements efficient caching, and manages real-time feed generation.

implementationSteps.title: Design the database schema
implementationSteps.description: Create tables for users, tweets, followers, and feed with proper indexing

implementationSteps.title: Implement timeline generation
implementationSteps.description: Build the feed generation logic with fan-out strategies

implementationSteps.title: Add caching layer
implementationSteps.description: Implement Redis for caching hot feeds and optimizing queries
